nodes.text: L1V-IN was an IN-4 information droid. Circa 3 ABY, Rebel Alliance operatives used L1V-IN as a blind drop for passing along confidential messages at the Kuat Passenger Port, but their cover was blown when Do'naal, an Imperial spy, discovered their system. The Empire secretly reprogrammed L1V-IN, which led to the capture of Rebel agent Rixen.
